title: Topic 006 Question 005
body: A company deploys Azure Bastion to connect to their virtual machine (VM) infrastructure.
An engineer attempts to connect to a Windows VM by using Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The connection fails.
You need to troubleshoot the issue.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Monitor traffic with the following PowerShell cmdlet New-AzNetworkWatcherFlowlog.
Apply a network security group on the same subnet as Azure Bastion.
Monitor traffic with the following PowerShell cmdlet Test-AzNetworkWatcherConnectivity.
Configure Azure Bastion with static assignment.
Run the Network Watcher Connection troubleshoot service.
